dict.acceptation: 了解，理解；知识（表示多方面的知识时有复数knowledges这一用法）；学科；见闻；

sent.orig: Knowledge acquisition, knowledge representation and knowledge utilization, those are three issues in knowledge engineering.
sent.trans: 知识获取、知识表示、知识运用是知识工程中的三大问题。

sent.orig: They are knowledge acquisition, knowledge transfer, knowledge sharing and knowledge application.
sent.trans: 将知识管理划分为：知识获取、知识转移、知识分享、知识应用四个过程。

sent.orig: The open integration of Knowledge depends on knowledge conversion, knowledge extraction and knowledge stanchion.
sent.trans: 知识的开放性集成依赖于知识转换、识抽取和知识标注。

sent.orig: Language teaching knowledge includes explicit teaching knowledge and tacit teaching knowledge.
sent.trans: 语文教学知识包括显性教学知识和缄默教学知识。

sent.orig: Theoretical pedagogical knowledge and practical pedagogical knowledge are key conceptions of the field of pedagogical knowledge.
sent.trans: 理论性教学知识和实践性教学知识是教学知识领域中的核心概念。
